title: Ban for no reason?
body: Okay I just got ban for no reason until june 20th? I didn't get an email and I haven't been Chat restricted yet or anything whats the deal??

replies.body: You need to email player support about your ban

> [{quoted}](name=nerak23,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=B1vTHERa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-06T21:07:40.600+0000)
>
> Check your E-mail junk files.

I have there is no email nothing..?

Check your profile to make sure the correct email is verified to your account. Just click your profile on the top right and go to **Settings**.

If it's correct you should have received one, but if you didn't you can submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get more information.

If it's *not* correct and you don't know what that email is, your account has been compromised and I advise you to follow the steps for recovering your account in this article, along with securing your email and changing passwords and scanning your PC for viruses; https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account

>

How many times are you going to shout this?

> Deep Terror Nami 

Thanks, much better then how I put it :)  You really do know your stuff.  I appreciate you !

> I have there is no email nothing..?

I suppose you can ask here on the boards for more info, but if you do I believe you allow Riot to post logs.  

Support ticket is another option. Be patient if you go this way, make a polite request, answer Q. with as much info as you remember but don't overload them and try not to bump.  This would be the way I'd try to do it.  Good Luck though.

I got this message and I don't have any email so wtf RIOT??"This account has been suspended until June 20, 2016. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details."
